text: Donald James Maggs (born November 1, 1961 in Youngstown, Ohio) is a former American football tackle/guard in the NFL for the Houston Oilers and Denver Broncos. Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Pittsburgh Maulers players Category:New Jersey Generals players Category:Houston Oilers players Category:Denver Broncos players Category:American football offensive linemen Category:Tulane Green Wave football players
title: Don Maggs
